mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.purchase_id AS "purchaseId", a.receipt_id AS "receiptId", a.supplier_id AS "supplierId", a.buyer_id AS "buyerId", a.order_date AS "orderDate", a.abstract_data AS "abstractData", a.other_saleman_id AS "otherSalemanId", a.repo_id AS "repoId", a.biz_group AS "bizGroup", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO acceptance( id, purchase_id, receipt_id, supplier_id, buyer_id, order_date, abstract_data, other_saleman_id, repo_id, biz_group, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{purchaseId}, #{receiptId}, #{supplierId}, #{buyerId}, #{orderDate}, #{abstractData}, #{otherSalemanId}, #{repoId}, #{bizGroup}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
